alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northwest Suffolk; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 5:56PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Queens, Richmond, western Suffolk, Kings and Nassau Counties through 645 PM EST... At 555 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Canarsie, or over Flatbush, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail are possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamaica, Flatbush, Flushing, Valley Stream, Huntington Station, Glen Cove, Plainview, Coney Island, Garden City, Lynbrook, Syosset, Mineola, Huntington, Woodmere and Westbury. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Northwest Suffolk; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
